title: Once
description: For three years and eight months Felix has lived in a convent orphanage high in the mountains of Poland. He is different from the other orphans, though, as Felix is convinced his parents are still alive and that they will one day come back to get him. But instead, the orphanage is visited by a group of Nazis. Accolades Winner of YABBA: Fiction for Years 7-9 2007. - Once By Morris Gleitzman (Paperback)
author: Morris Gleitzman
